pages.text: $(li)Melon is a fruit block that appears over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can use Melon Slices to craft $(l)Melons$(), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/melon_seeds)Melon Seeds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/glistering_melon_slice)Glistering Melon Slice$(/l), and a $(l:patchouli:armors/melon_armor)Melon Armor$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)This block can be grows up from $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/melon_seeds)Melon Seeds$(/l).
